## Capstone Timeline

**Semester 2 (Spring)**

-   Capstone adoption process begins - all students complete the capstone adoption web form

-   UP 510 Workshop assignments are shared by the department and the department enrolls students in their assigned UP 510 fall workshops

**Semester 3 (Fall)**

-   PDF capstone adoption form due for students petitioning onto the project or thesis pathways
-   Updated Plan of Study
-   Introduce capstone requirements including portfolio and poster requirements

**Semester 4 (Spring)**

-   Draft poster submission
-   Draft poster review session
-   Department awards ceremony and poster event (finals week)
-   Final exit deliverables due (finals week)
